oai_dc:dc.dc:title: INTERACTION BETWEEN MAIN ARMOUR AND TOE BERM DAMAGE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Aminti, P.
Lamberti, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: berm damage
armor
armor unit
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Wave flume tests were carried out aiming to describe and quantify the interaction between main armour and toe-berm damage up to failure. Experiments are descibed in brief, as well as the qualitative combined damaging process. An interaction scheme is formulated; data and formulae are provided for the quantification of the risk implied in the combined failure.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 25 (1996): Proceedings of 25th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Orlando, Florida, 1996.
